text: In Montana, the South Hills are the small foothills in various Montana communities, most notably those at el. , south of Missoula, Montana in Missoula County, Montana. Several districts of Missoula, Montana are, also, in the South Hills (such as Whitaker Heights/Farviews Neighborhood, Hillview Heights/South Hills Neighborhood, and Miller Creek-Linda Vista). ==See also== * List of mountain ranges in Montana ==Notes== Category:Mountain ranges of Montana Category:Mountains Ranges and Peaks in Missoula County, Montana Category:Landforms of Missoula County, Montana
title: South Hills (Montana)
